channel.title: Language Library on Ballerina Coding Tips
channel.description: Recent content in Language Library on Ballerina Coding Tips

item.title: Array Lang Library
item.description:
Array Lang Library

The Ballerina Array lang library - ballerina/lang.array provides functions that operate on list values, such as arrays and tuples. See available operations in the ballerina/lang.boolean module.

item.title: Boolean Lang Library
item.description:
Boolean Lang Library

The Ballerina Boolean lang library ( ballerina\lang.boolean ) provides functions that operate on a boolean value. As of now, it has only the fromString function. See available operations in the ballerina/lang.boolean module.
